column4: a factory located in Dambor Krao village
column8: 2018. ------When staff arrived at work early in the morning
column9: there was no security at the factory as usual and CCTV around the factory had been broken
column10: along with the computer system. ------Three private security guards are still missing
column11: along with an undisclosed amount of cash.------Police have questioned the private security firm who employ the missing trio.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/266702
